{"id":1158819448,"question_id":3299,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"4 months, 4 weeks","timestamp":1706412499,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"116 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1158819448/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Maximum Number of Elements in Subset","memory":"55.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int maximumLength(int[] nums) {\n        int res = 1;\n        int max = 31633;\n        \n        Arrays.sort(nums);\n\n        Map<Integer, Integer> count = new HashMap<>();\n        Map<Integer, Integer> len = new TreeMap<>();\n        \n        int result = 0;\n\n        for (int num : nums) {\n            if(!count.containsKey(num)){\n                len.put(num, 1);\n            }\n            count.put(num, count.getOrDefault(num, 0) + 1);\n        }\n        \n        for(int key: len.keySet()){\n            // System.out.println(\"key = \"+key+\" len(key)\" + len.get(key));\n            if(key == 1)\n                continue;\n            if(key>max)\n                break;\n            if(count.get(key)>=2){\n                int target = key*key;\n                if(count.containsKey(target)){\n                    // System.out.println(\"target = \"+target+\" len.get(key)+3 = \"+ (len.get(key)+2));\n                    len.put(target, len.get(key)+2);\n                    res = Math.max(res, len.get(target));\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        \n        int onelen = count.getOrDefault(1, 0);\n        if((onelen&1) == 0){\n            onelen--;\n        }           \n\n        return Math.max(res, onelen);\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-maximum-number-of-elements-in-subset","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
